pageContent: Objective: To describe recent trends in the use of radical prostatectomy (RP) in England, as there is currently no consensus on the most effective treatment for localized prostate cancer, although RP is the treatment of choice among urological surgeons for men aged < 70 years.

metaData.source:
Partitioned prostate cancer prevalence estimates: an informative measure of the disease burden
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11160174/
